titles.title: Safe Homes Safe Families Act of 2008
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide Federal penalties for home invasions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/14/2008--Introduced. Safe Homes Safe Families Act of 2008 - Amends the federal criminal code to impose criminal penalties for engaging in a home invasion while possessing a weapon that has moved in or affected interstate or foreign commerce.
